title: Temporal State Verifier Configuration
description: Defines the required source system and maximum acceptable latency for each Final Axiomatic State Validation (FASV) variable to prevent accepting temporally stale data.

verification_targets.description: Map of FASV field names to their required temporal provenance settings.

expected_source_stage.description: The upstream process stage expected to generate this data point.

max_staleness_ms.description: The maximum allowed time lag (in ms) between data creation timestamp and the S11 initiation request.
